describes: Base schema of catalog entry of type 'dataModels'.

id.describes: Unique identifier of the data resource within this domain

refBaseSchema.describes: Reference to the IUDX base schema for this catalog entry. It is assumed that the referred base schema has already been uploaded into the catalog OR stored in a pre-defined repository. The catalogue item comprises of fields from the refDataModel along with the refBaseSchema.

baseDataModel.describes: Link to base data model object on which this data model is based. The catalogue entry for this data model, qualifies (adds additional information) to each of the attributes contained in the base data model. For example, an attribute 'temperature' of type 'number' and units 'degreeCelcius' may be defined in the base model and in this catalogue entry further specific constraints may be added like 'minimum', 'maximum' ranges OR sharing policies OR links to semantic contexts for this attribute.

__createdAt.describes: Date of creation of this entry in the catalogue.

__updatedAt.describes: Last update date/time for this entry in the catalogue.

__deprecatedAt.describes: Date/time when this entry was deprecated (status set to deprecated).

__catalogueInstanceId.describes: Registered Id of the IUDX-catalouge instance to which this item belongs.
